rmssd.description: The Root Mean Square of Successive Differences (RMSSD) between heart beats.

coverage.description: Data completeness in terms of the number of interbeat intervals.

hf.description: The power in interbeat interval fluctuations within the high frequency band (0.15 Hz - 0.4 Hz).

lf.description: The power in interbeat interval fluctuations within the low frequency band (0.04 Hz - 0.15 Hz).

dailyRmssd.description: The Root Mean Square of Successive Differences (RMSSD) between heart beats. (Interval response)
